biotools.summary: Implements a direct, lattice-based method, which avoids enumeration of the reaction network implied by a set of rules. Models are specified using an extension of the BioNetGen language, which adds features necessary for characterizing diffusion properties of biomolecules.

bioschemas.name: SPATKIN
bioschemas.summary: Implements a direct, lattice-based method, which avoids enumeration of the reaction network implied by a set of rules. Models are specified using an extension of the BioNetGen language, which adds features necessary for characterizing diffusion properties of biomolecules.
